```{r setup, include=MediaLSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(xlsx)
library(dplyr)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggsci)
library(rstatix)
library (cowplot)

All_Data <- read_excel("OPLA POLA TAG.xlsx", sheet = 2)

All_Data$"Media" <- factor(All_Data$"Media", levels = c("Control", "800uM OPLA", "800uM POLA"))

```

``` {R}

res.aov <- aov(TAG ~ Media, data = All_Data)

summary(res.aov)
TukeyHSD(res.aov)

```

``` {R}
pairwise.test = All_Data %>% 
  t_test(TAG ~ Media)

ggbarplot(All_Data, x = "Media", "TAG",
       add = "mean_se", error.plot = "upper_errorbar", palette = "npg", legend = "none", fill = "Media", xlab = "Media", ylab = "Intracellular TAG
(umol/g of protein)") +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0,0), limits=c(0, 700)) +
theme(axis.text.x = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 16),
axis.text.y = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 16), 
axis.title.x = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 18),
axis.title.y = element_text(color = "grey20", size = 18)) +
  stat_pvalue_manual(pairwise.test, y.position = 550, step.increase = 0.1)
ggsave('C:/Users/fwestcott/OneDrive - Nexus365/Desktop/Results/OPLA-vs-POLA/graphs/TAG.png')
```
